trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptionProperty>" name="<EncryptionProperty>" href=""></xref> element used in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 表示<xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptionProperty>" name="<EncryptionProperty>" href=""> </xref> XML 加密中使用的元素。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The EncryptionProperty class encapsulates the `<EncryptionProperty>` element defined by the World Wide Web Consortium XML Encryption specification located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: EncryptionProperty 类封装`<EncryptionProperty>`World Wide Web 联合会 XML 加密规范所定义的元素位于 http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/。

trans-unit.source: Use the EncryptionProperty class to provide additional encryption information related to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> elements.
trans-unit.target: 使用 EncryptionProperty 类来提供与相关的其他加密信息<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>元素。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>

trans-unit.source: For example, use this class to specify a time stamp.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用此类指定时间戳。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> class using an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref>类使用<xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object to use for initialization.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref>用于初始化对象。

trans-unit.source: The elementProperty parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The elementProperty parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The property of the elementProperty parameter is not "EncryptionProperty". -or- The property of the elementProperty parameter is not "http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#".
trans-unit.target: <> *1> 属性 elementProperty 参数不是"EncryptionProperty"。 -或- <> *1> 属性 elementProperty 参数不是"http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#"。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object that encapsulates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref>封装的实例的对象<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The GetXml method returns a representation of the `<EncryptionProperty>` element.
trans-unit.target: GetXml 方法返回的表示形式`<EncryptionProperty>`元素。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object that encapsulates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref>封装的实例的对象<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the ID of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前的 ID <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"> </xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The ID is used to reference the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> object from another location.
trans-unit.target: 使用的 ID 为引用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty>另一个位置中的对象。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty>

trans-unit.source: The ID of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 当前的 ID <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"> </xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Parses the input <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> and configures the internal state of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref> object to match.
trans-unit.target: 分析输入<xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref>并配置的内部状态<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref>相匹配的对象。

trans-unit.source: The LoadXml method configures the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty> object to match the state of an <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> object.
trans-unit.target: LoadXml 方法配置<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty>相匹配的状态的对象<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>对象。</xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> object to parse.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref>要分析的对象。

trans-unit.target: The value parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The property of the value parameter is not "EncryptionProperty". -or- The property of the value parameter is not "http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#".
trans-unit.target: <> *1> 属性 value 参数不是"EncryptionProperty"。 -或- <> *1> 属性 value 参数不是"http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#"。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref>对象，表示<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionProperty"></xref>对象。
